popular.description: Games that everyone is talking about...

game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
game.description: As a young boy, Link is tricked by Ganondorf, the King of the Gerudo Thieves.

game.title: SoulCalibur
game.description: This is a tale of souls and swords, transcending the world and all its history, told for all eternity... The greatest weapons-based fighter returns, this time on Sega Dreamcast. Soul Calibur unleashes incredible graphics, fantastic fighters, and combos so amazing they'll make your head spin!

game.title: Grand Theft Auto IV
game.description: [Metacritic's 2008 Xbox 360 Game of the Year; Also known as "GTA IV"]

game.title: Super Mario Galaxy
game.description: 2007 Wii Game of the Year. The ultimate Nintendo hero is taking the ultimate step ... out into space.

game.title: Super Mario Galaxy 2
game.description: Super Mario Galaxy 2, the sequel to the galaxy-hopping original game, includes the gravity-defying, physics-based exploration from the first game, but is loaded with entirely new galaxies and features to challenge players.

game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
game.description: Ignore everything you know about The Legend of Zelda games.

game.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
game.description: Challenge up to four friends in online competitions over a LAN or the Internet. Take them on in both Trick Attack and Graffiti modes.

game.title: Perfect Dark (2000)
game.description: Step into the Dark... As Carrington Institute's most promising new Agent, Joanna Dark must uncover the truth behind the dataDyne Corporation's recent technological breakthroughs - breakthroughs which could have serious consequences for mankind.

game.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
game.description: Developed by the creators of Grand Theft Auto V and Red Dead Redemption, Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland.

game.title: Grand Theft Auto V
game.description: The sprawling sun-soaked metropolis of Los Santos is chock full of self-help coaches, starlets and C-List celebrities, once on top of the media world, now struggling to stay relevant in time of economic malaise and lowest-common-denominator reality TV.

game.title: Metroid Prime
game.description: Samus returns in a new mission to unravel the mystery behind the ruined walls scattered across Tallon IV.

game.title: Grand Theft Auto III
game.description: Players are put at the heart of their very own gangster movie, and let loose in a fully-realised 3 dimensional city with a cast of hundreds, 50 plus vehicles, ranging from sports cars to ice cream trucks and from boats to buses, 3 hours of music, including opera, reggae, house, drum and bass, pop and disco, and a huge array of street ready weapons.

game.title: Super Mario Odyssey
game.description: New Evolution of Mario Sandbox-Style Gameplay. Mario embarks on a new journey through unknown worlds, running and jumping through huge 3D worlds in the first sandbox-style Mario game since Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine. Set sail between expansive worlds aboard an airship, and perform all-new actions, such as throwing Mario's cap.

game.title: Halo: Combat Evolved
game.description: In a desperate attempt to keep a conquering alien race called the Covenant from finding Earth, you--a cybernetically enhanced soldier representing the peak of human military evolution--and a ragtag group of Marines flee to a distant uncharted system where you unexpectedly stumble across Halo, an enormous alien artifact in orbit between a gas giant and its moon. Your objective: Uncover Halo's horrible secret, and destroy mankind's nemesis - the Covenant.

retro.description: Retro classic games from your childhood.

game.title: Super Mario World
game.description: Join Mario and Luigi on their adventure to save Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches in this classic platformer.

game.title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
game.description: Embark on a quest with Link to rescue Princess Zelda and defeat the evil sorcerer Agahnim in this classic action-adventure game.

game.title: Super Metroid
game.description: Help Samus Aran explore the planet Zebes, defeat the Space Pirates, and stop the evil Mother Brain in this classic action-adventure game.

game.title: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
game.description: Play as Alucard, the son of Dracula, as you explore Dracula's castle, defeat powerful enemies, and uncover the secrets of the night.

game.title: Metroid Fusion
game.description: Help Samus Aran overcome an infection caused by the X Parasite, uncover the secrets of the research station, and save the galaxy.

game.title: Pac-Man Collection
game.description: Enjoy four classic Pac-Man games in one package: Pac-Man, Pac-Mania, Pac-Attack, and Pac-Man Arrangement.

game.title: Mario Kart Super Circuit
game.description: Race with Mario and friends through challenging tracks to win the coveted Mario Kart trophies. Unlock new tracks and master power-ups to outsmart opponents.

game.title: Super Mario Bros. 3
game.description: Join Mario and Luigi on their quest to rescue Princess Peach and save the Mushroom Kingdom from the clutches of Bowser.

game.title: Mega Man X
game.description: Battle the evil forces of Sigma and his army of Mavericks as the powerful Mega Man X in this action-packed platformer.

game.title: Street Fighter II
game.description: Street Fighter II is a competitive fighting game featuring a variety of characters with unique fighting styles and special moves.

game.title: Super Mario Bros.
game.description: Super Mario Bros. is a platform game where players control Mario as he travels through the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser.

game.title: Donkey Kong
game.description: Donkey Kong is an arcade game where players control Jumpman (later known as Mario) as he attempts to rescue a damsel in distress from Donkey Kong.

game.title: Space Invaders
game.description: Space Invaders is a classic arcade shooter where players control a laser cannon and defend against waves of invading aliens.
